name: Chronicles of the Reincarnated Demon God
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The Junior Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woon-hwi, was born without a dantian.However, through dark arts and his shitty personality— er, preternatural ability, he became the junior lord of the Heavenly Demon Cult.He was a man of many epithets:‘Great Sorcerer of the Dark Arts’&#039King of the Wandering Lost Souls’But the people’s assessment of him was simple:“If he smiles, run as fast as you can.
